message:
According to results of survey of European governments' authorities:
"79% of local government authorities show some use of FLOSS"

Authorities say: "We expects to save 30 percent on hardware costs alone thanks to the efficiency of Linux -- this, in addition to cost savings associated with licensing fees and other economic benefits he had expected prior to testing open source for city-wide deployment."

Are you interested in knowing how Egypt can make use of Free, Libre, Open-Source Software?

Then join us during Day 1 to know more about the concept of FLOSS, Linux, Ubuntu, & last but not least "How is FLOSS the answer to many of our problems in Egypt?"
